entry.title: 12" x 107" | Burgundy | Premium Velvet Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 3.79 - 354.99 (2 variants)

[About]

QTY: 1 Table Runner
Fabric: Velvet
Color: Burgundy
Size: 107" Length x 12" Width
Edge: Serged
Feature: Soft, textured feel with sheen finish
Seamless, 1 Pcs Design
Care Instructions: Hand wash in cold water, line dry. Do not bleach/iron.
﻿All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Qty: 1 Table Runner
  • Fabric: Velvet
  • Color: Burgundy
  • Size: 107" Length x 12" Width
  • Edges: Serged
  • 1 Pcs Seamless Design
  • Feature: Soft, textured feel with sheen finish
  • Maintenance: Gently hand wash, spills immediately. Refrain from rubbing the fabric. Gently brush out dried substances. Turn inside out when ironing or steaming. When ironing, move in the direction of the pile. Keep away from direct sunlight to avoid fading.
